features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: As a student of arcane magic, you have a spellbook containing spells that show the first glimmerings of your true power.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: You have learned to regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook. Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up), and none of the slots can be 6th level or higher.

features.name: Arcane Tradition
features.description: You choose an arcane tradition, shaping your practice of magic through one of eight schools.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Drow Magic
traits.description: You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the faerie fire spell once per day. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Drow Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.
